謕字的基本解释

謕
tí
古同“啼”：“孤子謕号。”

謕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
“嗁1”的今字。亦作“嗁1”。“諦2”的被通假字。亦作“謕1”。
(1)悲哀的哭泣。
(2)借指眼泪。
(3)鸣叫。

謕字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謕； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第11
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?與啼同。【揚子·方言】詀謕。詳詀字註。【前漢·嚴助傳】孤子謕號。【師古註】謕古啼字。　又與諦同。詳諦字註。　又【廣韻】土雞切【集韻】天黎切，?音梯。語相誘也。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】息移切【集韻】相支切，?音斯。數諫也，諒也。

謕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謕字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
謕
tí
Gu Tong "Cry": "Solitary Son Wanhao."
謕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
The present word for "嗁1". Also known as "嗁1". The false word for "谛2". Also known as "謕1".
(1) Sad crying.
(2) By means of tears.
(3) Tweet.
謕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謕; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1175 No. 11
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Same as cry. 【Yangtze Dialect】Qingqi. Detailed note of the word. [Previous Han · Yan Zhuan] Solitary Son's Number. 【Shigu Note】Wanggu Cry word.　Same as Truth again. Detailed explanation of the word.　[Guangyun] Chicken cut [Jiyun] Tianli cut, sound ladder. The language is also tempting.　 [Yu Pian] [Guang Yun] interest shift cut [Ji Yun] phase branch cut,? Yin Si. If you have a few admonishments, forgive you.
